comments.creator: surkov.alexander@gmail.com
comments.author: surkov.alexander@gmail.com
comments.text:
Run electrolysis on trunk:

cd $objdir/dist/bin
./firefox -P JunkProfile -chrome chrome://global/content/test-ipc.xul

and wave by mouse on chrome or resize the window.

stack:
>	xul.dll!mozilla::layout::RenderFrameParent::BuildLayer(nsDisplayListBuilder * aBuilder, nsIFrame * aFrame, mozilla::layers::LayerManager * aManager, const nsIntRect & aVisibleRect)  Line 661 + 0x2e bytes	C++

and wave by mouse on chrome or resize the window.
